de.ailis.usb4java.topology

Class Usb4JavaHub

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ailis.usb4java.topology.Usb4JavaDevice
      • de.ailis.usb4java.topology.Usb4JavaHub
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UsbPorts<Usb4JavaPort,Usb4JavaDevice>, javax.usb.UsbDevice, javax.usb.UsbHub

    public final class Usb4JavaHub
extends Usb4JavaDevice
implements javax.usb.UsbHub, UsbPorts<Usb4JavaPort,Usb4JavaDevice>
    usb4java implementation of JSR-80 UsbHub.
    Author:
    Klaus Reimer (k@ailis.de)
